thread.title: Clarity Ventures Joins Agiloft's Global Partner Program as Certified Reseller
thread.title_full: Clarity Ventures Joins Agiloft's Global Partner Program as Certified Reseller

title: Clarity Ventures Joins Agiloft's Global Partner Program as Certified Reseller
text: Clarity Ventures Joins Agiloft's Global Partner Program as Certified Reseller -- REDWOOD CITY, Calif., Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Clarity Ventures Joins Agiloft's Global Partner Program as Certified Reseller Custom web application designers to feature Agiloft's award-winning Contract Management solution within their extensive eCommerce and mobile web design offerings 08:45 ET from Agiloft REDWOOD CITY, Calif. , Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Agiloft, Inc., a trusted provider of agile business process software, announced today that Austin, Texas -based Clarity Ventures has joined Agiloft's growing Partner Program as a Certified Reseller. Agiloft's award-winning solutions for Contract Lifecycle Management, Service Desk, and custom Workflow/BPM will round out Clarity's best-in-class custom eCommerce and mobile web design offerings. "Clarity is a welcome addition to our rapidly growing partner ecosystem," said Colin Earl , CEO of Agiloft. "Clarity's extensive experience in custom web application development and dedication to providing robust, effective, and timely solutions make them a perfect complement to Agiloft's top-rated suite of business process applications, and we are pleased to have them on board as a Certified Reseller." "We are delighted to join Agiloft's Partner Program," said Ron Halversen , Vice President, Sales and Marketing for Clarity Ventures. "The limitless adaptability of Agiloft's custom development platform and highly configurable out-of-the-box applications will enable us to deliver rapid, cutting-edge solutions for our clients' most complex business challenges. Agiloft's enterprise-level scalability and integration capabilities make it a great match for our full range of customers, from startups to the Fortune 500." Agiloft's Partner Program offers resellers industry-leading revenue margins of 35 to 45 percent, with ongoing revenue for the life of each contract. Certified Resellers also retain 100 percent of Professional Services revenue. Other benefits of partnership with Agiloft include: Referral, reseller, and white label opportunities Deal registration and lead assignment for customer exclusivity No sales quotas or minimum sales requirements Free Agiloft development license for partner (10 staff users and 50 end users) Co-branded sales and marketing collateral Free online training For more information on Agiloft's Partner Program, visit http://www.agiloft.com/partner-programs.htm . About Agiloft Over 2.5 million users at organizations ranging from small enterprises to U.S. government agencies and Fortune 100 companies depend on Agiloft's innovative applications for Help Desk , Contract Management , Custom Workflow , and more. Agiloft specializes in automating processes that are too complex for competing vendors. Our best practice templates and agile technology ensure rapid deployment and a fully extensible system. For more information, visit http://www.agiloft.com . Media Contact:
